original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhantā sūpaññeva bahuṁ paṭiggaṇhanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū piṇḍapātam paṭiggaṇhantā bahum paṭiggaṇhanti pe
sama sūpakam piṇḍapātam paṭiggahessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
dve sūpā mugga sūpaḥ māsa sūpaḥ hattha hāriyaḥ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṁ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca su upaññā iva bahum paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa
